thread.title: Stacy

author: Stacy
title: Stacy
text: I was a little wary to order a pram as its just online and would have loving to see it before I bought it!! But I was pleasantly surprised I pre ordered the uberchild Moto in soft grey as I don't know the sex yet,, It came on time and I got regular emails,, as soon as it said it was shipped I received it the very next day üëçüèª and was delighted with it the travel system as a whole it was easy to put together and looks gorgeous!! It looks more expensive then what we paid (sale price of ‚Ç¨350) I would definitely order again and would recommend this site to family and friends 100%. üòä
